thread.title: Australian travelers stranded around the world following a bank glitch
thread.title_full: Australian travelers stranded around the world following a bank glitch | Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Australian travelers stranded around the world following a bank glitch
text:
Australian travelers stranded around the world following a bank glitch Published on : Monday, August 3, 2015
Australian travelers around the world have been left stranded without money as their travel cash cards have stopped functioning. Commonwealth Bank, an Australia based bank is going through a technical problem from Monday affecting over thousands of holiday travelers.
Travelers began complaining about the issue on Monday and only realized the problem with their cards when they could no longer access their own uploaded funds.
According to the reports, a spokesman from the bank apologized online for the error and also issued a statement on Monday. The statements on record stated, “Commonwealth Bank apologizes to our customers who were inconvenienced by this and we thank them for their patience.”
